predicate.note: Frames file for 'accomplish' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'manage'.

roleset.name: do, pull off

example.name: bad example
example.text: Our mission is to help our clients grow, and to use every tool of marketing communications *trace* to accomplish that.''

roleset.note: This is a bad example because it's unclear what the trace points to. I take the trace as pointing to "we" as in "We accomplish our mission using every tool of marketing communications."
